channel.title: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]
channel.description:
I'm working on a survival type rsps to host, and I decided to make a day/night type thing.
I do have more that I plan to do with this, but I won't be posting it on here.
[B]Note: The time of day usually changes every 10 minutes (making a full day 40 minutes), but it has been shortened to a minute for this video.[/B]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d7GCInAlbOU[/youtube]
Also take note that I can restart the server, and the days don't reset. This feature is also 'global' meaning time will go on as long as the server is online.
Any comments and other suggestions?

item.title: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

this would require client-sided editing which i am unable to do, and would also require me to completely re-work the core of how the time is processed. ill figure something out. thanks

Read full topic
item.source: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]

item.title: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“vManlyMan, post:11, topic:477787”][quote author=TheTutMan link=topic=595983.msg4197118#msg4197118 date=1357667748]
This might sound like a bad idea but you could add a clock to tell your players when its nerly night time and or just warning
[/quote]

There is warnings in the chatbox when the time changes.[/quote]
I think what TheTutMan is saying is that he Clawz could add a game clock in the upper right hand corner (example) and it would change as the time changes in the server, not every time the world gets darker/lighter.

Read full topic
item.source: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]

item.title: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You could use the map that runescape used in well… I forgot the quest name… I’ll go try and find it.
It’s in East Ardrogune (how ever that’s spelled) and you go underground, and you need to follow the maze and dodge traps and crap.
Anyways. You can use that map for advanced Zombies, and if the player(s) survive, they could gain some sort of cosmetic reward.

Read full topic
item.source: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]

item.title: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

PvPXile:

No offense, but it’s loveing pointless at the moment.

How is this pointless at all?

So you’re telling me the whole zombies come out at night concept is borked?

You’re also telling me that a flexible server-based calender that runs with the days, which could have a multitude of uses, is also borked.

plz elaborate

PvPXile:

Black out the minimap at night.

I’ll think about it

arham 4:

637 or so.

I hate that revision. The highest I’m willing to go (other than with nick) is 474.

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:477787”]Also, make an underground passage where there are lanterns, and from that underground passage you can go to other cities. You can also get lanterns from the underground passage.

Also, make zombies like rock crabs, they can’t appear in the minimap. That way it won’t be that easy.[/quote]
Two good ideas I’ll take into consideration. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]

item.title: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:477787”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=595983.msg4196279#msg4196279 date=1357527376]
Needs lighting to emphasize the fact that it is night.
[/quote]
Did you look at the video? LOL I can’t make it any darker.[/quote]

You can make it darker, but it’s not as easy as just changing the lighting

Read full topic

item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:5, topic:477787”]If your gonna do this in 317, then good luck. This would look so much better in 637 or so.

Also, make an underground passage where there are lanterns, and from that underground passage you can go to other cities. You can also get lanterns from the underground passage.[/quote]
This reminds me on TranZit on BLO2

Read full topic

item.title: My day/night system and other features [Need suggestions]
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

If your gonna do this in 317, then good luck. This would look so much better in 637 or so.

Also, make an underground passage where there are lanterns, and from that underground passage you can go to other cities. You can also get lanterns from the underground passage.

Also, make zombies like rock crabs, they can’t appear in the minimap. That way it won’t be that easy.

Read full topic
